mapper.select: select c.* from channels c join channel_members cm on c.id = cm.channel_id where cm.user_id = #{userId}

select cm.user_id as userId, u.user_type as userType, u.nickname as nickname, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl, cm.role as role, cm.is_muted as isMuted, cm.create_time as createTime from channel_members cm join users u on cm.user_id = u.id where cm.channel_id = #{channelId}

select m.id as id, m.content_type, m.content, m.metadata, m.create_time, u.id as senderId, u.nickname as senderNickname, u.avatarUrl as senderAvatarUrl from messages m join users u on u.id = m.sender_id where m.channel_id = #{channelId}
